thread.title: City snapshot: First signs of recovery for UK grocery industry
thread.title_full: City snapshot: First signs of recovery for UK grocery industry

title: City snapshot: First signs of recovery for UK grocery industry
text:
19 Oct 2015 | By Edward Devlin 
Stability is finally returning to the struggling UK grocery sector with the number of failing businesses within the UK food supply chain falling for first time in 27 months, according to Begbies Traynor. Available to members only
